com.cboe.interfaces.domain.product
Interface Derivative

All Superinterfaces:
com.cboe.interfaces.domain.DomainBase, Product
All Known Subinterfaces:
Future, LinkedNote, Option, StructuredProduct, UnitInvestmentTrust, Warrant
public interface Derivative
extends Product

A product whose values are dependent on a single underlying product.
